data.text: Place is awesome. People are more awesome. It made our stay very memorable and comfortable. We checked in early,but they accomodate us. Shout out to all the people we've meet and made our stay so much pleasant. In the counter- Ms. Sita, thank you for giving us more reason to stay again in the hotel. Your company needs more people like you. Thank you for the surprise present. To the Pool guys- did not got your names, you are absolutely very accomodating. Seeing our safety first. To the restaurant- Ms. Misoumi, you are the smiling girl that made our breakfast more lovely. And to the housekeeping in morning,i did not got your name,smiling and very friendly,salute to you also. The toilet are so awesome. Very smelling good. Except for the toilet near the counter. Room are very interesting. Though its not so big,but its wonderful. Location is very nice also. Easy to reach. And hotel is budget friendly.
data.title: Awsome stay

user_location.name: Al Ain, Emirate of Abu Dhabi

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear vincentsibal,
Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you had an awesome stay and that our team went above and beyond to make your visit memorable and comfortable. We're delighted that Sita, the pool staff, Mosoumi, and the housekeeping team all contributed to your enjoyable experience. Your kind words about our facilities and location are truly appreciated. We're glad you found our hotel budget-friendly and convenient. Your feedback motivates us to continue providing exceptional service to all our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay in the future!
Warm regards,
Analin, Cluster Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Analin Topacio

data.text: Peduro and Sita gave us a warm welcome and friendly atmosphere, which I would like to thank.. Mousumi from the restaurant was a delight and was very kind. The swimming pool was fantastic and the view was stunning. We will definitely return.  This place is highly recommended .
data.title: Highly recommended"Thank you Peduro ,Sita and Mousumi !!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear makarla,
Thank you for your kind words and recommendation! We're thrilled to hear that Peduro, Sita, and Mousumi provided you with a warm welcome and friendly service. It's wonderful to know that you enjoyed the fantastic swimming pool and stunning views. We truly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the future!
Warm regards,
Analin, Cluster Guest Experience Manager

data.text: Excellent staff specially charlene and Sita The room is very tidy and clean  Food is great too and also the location is very accessible to go other place many restaurants nearby and shopping mall, also bus stop is just a few minutes away . I definitely recommend it for everyone travelling to dubai .
data.title: Very nice hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,
Thank you for your glowing review! We're delighted to hear that you had a very nice experience at our hotel. It's wonderful to know that Charlene and Sita provided you with excellent service and that you found the room tidy and clean. We're glad you enjoyed the great food and appreciated our convenient location with nearby restaurants, shopping malls, and easy access to transportation. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another pleasant stay in Dubai!
Warm regards,
Analin, Cluster Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Analin Topacio

data.text: Nice food with nice staff Cathy.^^ The food have something different everyday. It’s good. And the staff are very friendly. I hope everyone can come and try the meal in this hotel. And the environment is chill and relax. Just come and enjoy your time!
data.title: Nice breakfast

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,
Thank you for your positive feedback! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and found our food to be delicious. Our team works hard to provide a variety of options and ensure a pleasant dining experience for our guests.

We're especially glad to hear that you had a great interaction with Cathy and found our staff to be friendly. Providing excellent service is important to us, and we'll be sure to pass along your kind words to Cathy and the rest of our team.

We appreciate your recommendation to other guests to come and enjoy a meal at our hotel. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we're thrilled to hear that you had a chill and relaxing experience.

If there's anything else we can do to make your next visit even more enjoyable or if you have any further feedback, please don't hesitate to let us know. We appreciate your patronage and look forward to welcoming you back soon for another wonderful dining experience!

Warm regards,
Analin, Cluster Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Analin Topacio

data.text: wonderful  people and chef is good we have suhoor and the food is good cathy help ed us and the chef too coffee at coffee  shop is taste i can  recommended the suhoor because  thry chsnge food everyday and the stuff cathy is there to help. eggs are made on order and chef girish

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your suhoor and found the food to be good. Providing delicious and varied options for our guests is important to us, and we're glad to hear that you appreciated the efforts of our chef and staff.

We're especially grateful for your kind words about Cathy and Chef Girish. We'll be sure to pass along your compliments to them and the rest of our team. Providing excellent service and quality food is our priority, and we're glad that they were able to enhance your experience.

We're also pleased to hear that you enjoyed the coffee at our coffee shop. Your recommendation of our suhoor and the personalized egg orders is greatly appreciated.

We appreciate your patronage and look forward to welcoming you back soon for another wonderful dining experience!

Warm regards,
Analin, Cluster Guest Experience Manager
